desc: A tasty electrolyte drink mix designed for a fasting oriented lifestyle. A clean electrolyte powder so you can feel and perform your best while fasting. Great for a Keto or low carb lifestyle. Ideal for intermittent fasting. Perfect for extended fasting. 4-5x the electrolytes of other products.

layout.text: Designed for a fasting lifestyle. With everything you need, and nothing you don't...
